abstract.text: Common definitions for
s which support retrieving result rows.

queries.

Run the query specified by the builder, calling the provided handler closure with each output row, if any, as
it is received.
An expression representing a
query. Used to retrieve rows and expression results from a database.
Using a default-configured
, call the provided handler closure with the result of decoding
each output row, if any, as a given type.
Builds top-level
queries which may be executed on their own.
An expression representing two or more
queries joined by
clauses. Used to merge the results of
multiple queries into a single result set.
SQLKit is a library for building and serializing SQL queries in Swift.

; this builder wraps the original

conformance. As such, the
